+.code: local stack = ... if #stack._entries <= 0 then return "Err:Stack Underflow" end local a = stack.pop() local b = stack.pop() stack.push(a+b)

-.code: local stack = ... if #stack._entries <= 0 then return "Err:Stack Underflow" end local a = stack.pop() local b = stack.pop() stack.push(a-b)

*.code: local stack = ... if #stack._entries <= 0 then return "Err:Stack Underflow" end local a = stack.pop() local b = stack.pop() stack.push(a*b)

/.code: local stack = ... if #stack._entries <= 0 then return "Err:Stack Underflow" end local a = stack.pop() local b = stack.pop() stack.push(a/b)
